text:

As Barr releases info to Congress this weekend, more will be confirmed.
author: Joyce_Karam

text:

• Handed to Barr at 5 pm, secret
• Barr will disclose some stuff he chooses to Congress Committee
• White House not briefed
• Dems Leadership wants it to be public
• Trump at Mar-a-lago  
• There will be a Fight

text:
In between dates Trump said he agreed w Turkey on a Safe Zone, but that has not come up again.

US trying to get Europeans to help in sending troops. So far,no interest.

ISIS as insurgency group is v much present in Iraq & Syria. Gen. Votel said last week t’s “far from defeated”
author: Joyce_Karam

text:
Trump’s #Syria Withdrawal Timeline

•Dec 19: Full Withdrawal in 30 days; ISIS “Defeated”
•Dec 20: Mattis Resigns
•Dec 22: ISIS “largely defeated”
•Jan 29:Intel says ISIS Not defeated
•Feb 21: US will leave Force in Syria
•Today: US leaving 400 Troops
author: Joyce_Karam

text:
We have so far gone from full withdrawal pledge to leave in 30 days after Trump  with Erdogan, to establish safe zone with Turkey to neither happening now. 

90 days later, No safe zone agreement, no full withdrawal, no clear idea what 400 troops scattered in NE Syria will do..
author: Joyce_Karam

text:
3 Months to the day on his #Syria Withdrawal plan, Trump Reverses & will leave 400 Troops.

No clear sustainable US strategy says @Charles_Lister . No agreement reached with France or UK or Turkey.

Today, out of all days, on 16th anniversary of Iraq invasion, it’s wrong after all destruction/death to make it part of political attack for Trump against McCain.

More odd that this line of attack came less than 2 hours after Trump confirmed he is leaving 400 US troops in Syria
author: Joyce_Karam

text:
Few things to note on #Trump attack on late John McCain :

• McCain didn’t want Trump at Funeral
• Trump’s VP Pence voted for Iraq war. NSA Bolton helped drive war
• McCain was not President in 2003
• Trump is willingly continuing war
• This is not about Iraq

Differences still include defining threats (Iran, Islamism), Energy, relations with Russia and China.

Now House expected to pass, then Trump Veto. 54 is not enough to override veto (two thirds) which means a block by White House.
